title: LF Plat + ACTIVE players for Open Ladder!
body:
Hey everyone, atm my team is myself, a master tier player, and a diamond 3 player.

Currently putting together a trial team to play in ranked 5's, and we'll see who we like for the actual team. If you'd like a trial just add me in game and i'll add you to the team

Colzy2

replies.body:
i know you said plat +
but keen to try out as a support if you guys need a 5th until you find a 5th.
Only gold, prefer ranked's over solo que
ign : Wolves

if you dnt like you can always say you need someone more skilled, just here to learn but slighly serious about 5's

hey im keen... 

im plat 1
pref mid/supp/jungle
ign: Bpopster17
